content: @Brett Marquard @Robert Scanlon The Epic "open" server is: https://connectathon.epic.com/Interconnect-Fhir-Unsecure/api/FHIR/R4/. The FHIR ID you can use is eroCd17NbCffM3E3WXi7eOQ3. I've removed the Epic-Client-ID header requirement for our Unsecure endpoint.
thank you! that makes things a bit simpler on our side to do quick us core tests
